page.title: 06Ringmer Village Calendar
page.content: {New Year:}Football Club pantomime {Spring:}Ascension Day. Junior School attends church. {May:}Scout Fair on Village Green. May- pole and Morris Dancing. {June:}School sports. {July:}Ringmer Carnival occasionally held. Parade of floats and fete. {August:}Caburn Football Club Sports Fete. Race - Mt.Caburn to Club Field. {November:}Remembrance Sunday. Royal British Legion and local associations march to war memorial for Service. {December:}Schoolchildren sing carols to old people of Broyle Lane on last evening of term. Horticultural shows during Spring, Summer and Autumn - competitions for best produce; childrens' competition for creative works and handicraft. Over 56 village societies meet weekly or monthly.
